Generation VI.X: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.
Generation VI.Y: Using psychic power, it generates a fiery vortex of 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit , incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Using psychic power, it generates a fiery vortex of 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit , incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It leaves burn marks in the ground with the flame at the tip of its wand. Long ago, people used the shapes of these burn marks for divination.
Generation IX.Violet: It controls flames telekinetically, trapping its foes in a fiery vortex surpassing 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit and burning them to a crisp.
